title: My font !
content:
This is my first typography project in my graduated course. I used my handwriting and brushes of Chinese calligraphy to create my own typeface. My medium is Illustrator. Please give me any opinion, I want to make them more specific and creative.   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010653im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/68823.jpg)
author: rosanie

comments.content:
I think these first characters look nice, but it may be hard to give any decent opinion, or helpful feedback, after having seen just those two or three characters.. ( Do you have any more samples to show.? Any other characters.? Any scribbles, sketches.? )   
   
_( Oh, And a mod note.: Maybe this thread should rather be in the 'Script / Handwriting' part of the 'Critique' forum, at Typophile.? )_
